com.esri.mo2.client.io
Class EsrimapSecureInputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.InputStream
        |
        +--java.io.FilterInputStream
              |
              +--com.esri.mo2.client.io.EsrimapSecureInputStream
public class EsrimapSecureInputStream
extends FilterInputStream

This class provides methods to receive encrypted responses from the Application Server. The stream can be accessed just like a standard java I/O stream.

Field Summary
protected  DataInputStream _dataIn
          The DataInputStream that contains the data sent back from the Application Server.
 
Fields inherited from class java.io.FilterInputStream
in
 
Constructor Summary
EsrimapSecureInputStream(InputStream input)
          Constructs a new EsrimapSecureInputStream object that allows you to read data from the Admin server (in Esrimap).
